featureType.name: taxomap
featureType.title: taxomap
featureType.nativeCRS: GEOGCS["WGS 84", DATUM["World Geodetic System 1984", SPHEROID["WGS 84", 6378137.0, 298.257223563, AUTHORITY["EPSG","7030"]], AUTHORITY["EPSG","6326"]], PRIMEM["Greenwich", 0.0, AUTHORITY["EPSG","8901"]], UNIT["degree", 0.017453292519943295], AXIS["Geodetic longitude", EAST], AXIS["Geodetic latitude", NORTH], AUTHORITY["EPSG","4326"]]

virtualTable.name: taxomap
virtualTable.sql: select taxomap.id as id, geometry, institution.code as "institutionCode", -- IMEDEA, MCNB, MVHN, UB, IBB collection_code as "collectionCode", catalog_number as "catalogNumber", basis_of_record.code as "basisOfRecord", -- FOSSIL, NON_FOSSIL taxon_id as "taxonID", backbone_with_ancestors.canonical_name as "scientificName", st_y(geometry) as "decimalLatitude", st_x(geometry) as "decimalLongitude", event_date as "eventDate", country_code as "countryCode", state_province as "stateProvince", county, municipality, georeference_verification_status as "georeferenceVerificationStatus", -- VERIFIED, UNVERIFIED identification_verification_status as "identificationVerificationStatus", -- VERIFIED, UNVERIFIED institution_id, basis_of_record_id, 1 as domain_id, kingdom_id, phylum_id, class_id, order_id, family_id, genus_id, species_id, subspecies_id from taxomap, institution, basis_of_record, backbone_with_ancestors where taxomap.institution_id = institution.id and taxomap.basis_of_record_id = basis_of_record.id and taxomap.taxon_id = backbone_with_ancestors.id
